pinyin: yan2 zhong4 ji2 xing4 hu1 xi1 xi4 tong3 zong1 he2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症

definition: more critical with every passing day

sentences.english: Her arms showed green patches, indicating heavy internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳膊出现了青斑，表明有严重的内出血。

sentences.english: "The abductee issue is [one] of grave concern, " Clinton said.
sentences.chinese: “绑架问题值得严重关切，”希拉里说。

sentences.english: Heavily infected areas will appear thin and chlorotic (yellow to light brown).
sentences.chinese: 严重感染的地区会显得细瘦萎黄。

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质反应与烧伤的严重性是平行的。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下来，但患有缺氧及脑出血等严重病症。

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然两国争执的源由是双方的严重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: L/C Payment problem is becoming serious to each bank.
sentences.chinese: 信用证垫款问题是各银行面对的日趋严重的一个问题。

sentences.english: Major non-conformities should require on-site verification within 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 严重不符合项应该要求在80天内完成现场验证工作。

sentences.english: The criminal personality plays an important role in severely violent crimes.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪人格在严重暴力犯罪中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: He was caught by an avalanche and was seriously concussed.
sentences.chinese: 他碰到雪崩，受到严重的脑震荡。

sentences.english: In other words, it wreaks havoc on our memory.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，它对我们的记忆力造成了严重的破坏。

sentences.english: Severe cases may progress to confusion and coma.
sentences.chinese: 情况严重的会进一步恶化以致昏迷及神志不清。

sentences.english: It may look like a severe sunburn, later becoming reddish Brown, rough, and scaly.
sentences.chinese: 初看似严重的晒斑，后呈红褐色，粗糙并有鳞屑。

sentences.english: Psychiatrists say serious depression may have been the main reason for the killing.
sentences.chinese: 严重的抑郁症可能是她犯案的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: The clinical data of 36 cases of severe pulmonary contusion was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对36例严重肺挫伤患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱灾害是湖南省最严重的自然灾害。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to make heavier/to emphasize/(of an illness etc) to become more serious/to aggravate (a bad situation)/to increase (a burden, punishment etc)
to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
